actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to increase the salaries of the Chairman and members of the Federal Reserve Board.

summary.text: Upgrades the offices of the Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System from position II to position I of the Executive Schedule and the Members of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System from position III to position II of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to increase the salaries of the Chairman and members of the Federal Reserve Board.
